segments.text: We will carry out the order when the purchase order gets here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . And because this is our initial order , and your products is so new , we would like to make a deal with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , actually in most cases we don't talk about special deals , but since this one is so new I will listen to what you have to say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want to make this a trial order . If we can sell all the products in two months , we will pay for them ; if not , we will send them back to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't agree to that . My company will have to pay for both sending them and bringing them back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We promise that if the products are sold out in two months , we will place a repeat order right away , at the same quality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I agree . But the repeat order can't have the same terms .
segments.speaker: S1
